Name: Rob Riches
About the game: “You are Rob Riches. Solve the temple mystery!” GATHER ALL THE COINS! Your quest? To gather all the coins of course! Solve the puzzle to get each shiny coin, and unlock the path forward. WATCH YOUR STEP! Some tiles might just fall down, and seal your fate. Make sure you plan ahead in these dangerous temples. In Rob Riches, each step may be your last! OUT OF MY WAY! What are all these stones doing here? Some stones can be moved out of the way, use them to protect you or place them on a pressure plate to open a path forward. IT'S A TRAP! Be careful! Each temple has its own set of traps and dangers you must overcome. TEST YOUR WIT! As you delve further, the challenges become progressively more difficult to truly test your puzzle solving skills! CLAIM YOUR PRIZE! Surpass the dangers to claim each world's great treasure - they belong in a museum! FEATURES Nearly 100 unique, handcrafted levels. Made a horrible mistake? No worries, use the undo button ! Turn-based traps and mechanics in Sokoban style puzzles. Beat the devs and improve your best solutions with the step counter . Three distinct worlds with environmental hazards like ice, falling rocks and of course: flamethrowers! Can you find the ultra secret red coins ? Jump right into puzzle solving! No long cutscenes or tedious tutorials needed. Levels get progressively more difficult as you progress through the worlds. Play a game about robbing riches as a character named Rob Riches in a game called Rob Riches.
